summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 1.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 132 m) and rainfall (down 1.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1718 m), rainfall (down 1.4 mm), feels like temperature (up 2.2°C), and outside temperature (up 2.7°C) when compared to today.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 713m and a peak of 1594m, averaging 935.0m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, pleasant humidity levels and very little to no wind will be present. Drizzle or light rain possible, occasional overcast conditions, and it’s dim outside. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
